data.name: Lost In The Open
data.detailed_description:
Lost In The Open is a turn-based tactical roguelike set in a low-fantasy medieval world.



You play as Nrvesk, the ruler of Ruedome. Your reign was bloody, oppressive and unjust. Whether it be because of your inaction, selfish action or evil action, your past crimes have caught up to you. Consequently, you are the target of an assassination attempt made by your allies. By some miracle, your band of renowned bodyguards manage to keep you alive and rush you to a hidden backdoor which faces directly into the forests of Wailon, a no-man's land between Ruedome and Stratha.



You begin your desperate escape through the forest, you and the two remaining bodyguards. You must choose your path wisely to gather resources, weapons and to train your men as you expand your party with people, desperate, wicked and foolish alike.

Clash with enemies in turn-based tactical combat




You will command your men in grid-based combat, each unit type, allied or enemy, with up to 5 unique abilities. You will face the AI which intelligently analyses the combat situation and attempts to outmaneuver you.

But it is not as simple as fighting for survival. Unless you demonstrate a desire to repent for the crimes committed during your reign you will be hunted down by The Righteous, people from all walks of life united by a singular purpose - to destroy you. This demonstration must be done with real consequences, which will have game-changing effects - some detrimental in the long-term, some in the short-term, but all with the benefit of reducing the frequency of encounters and the strength of The Righteous. The player has to make difficult decisions between the short-term and the long-term.

Manage your abilities and equipment






In order to survive, overarching decisions have to be made carefully. Trade food, bandages, weapons and armors in order to prepare for progressively more difficult encounters.

Choose your path wisely.




If you want to survive in the procedurally generated minefield of encounters, make each move wisely. But don't delay, if you are caught by your pursuers you will be decimated.

Key features
  • Manage a medieval low-fantasy party escaping across a procedurally generated world.
  • Command intricate turn-based tactical battles with many abilities and unit types.
  • Interact with hand-drawn graphics in a unique 2.5D perspective.
  • Handle permadeath. You will need to accept losses when necessary.
  • Develop your characters with abilities, equipment and trinkets.
  • Fight with and against a varied roster of allied and enemy units. Each unit has unique equipment and abilities.
  • Escape through an atmospheric no-man's land of deadly and difficult decisions.
  • Make excruciating decisions in events of repentance or face increasingly zealous squads of The Righteous.
  • Experience the game with tailored music, intense and despairing.

data.short_description: Lost In The Open is an atmospheric turn-based tactical game set in a procedurally generated low-fantasy world. As the target of an assassination attempt, you must fight tooth and nail to escape through the forests of Wailon while repenting for your past crimes as king.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game's mature content is almost exclusively its fantasy combat. The level of gore is very limited. Swords, arrows and various weaponry is present and is used but does not generally result in much blood. Story lines are mild, although may contain descriptions of violence, again very mild.
